title: Now For Something Completely Different!
content: Greater Albion Typefounders has released "Daub", something of a departure from our usual projects, in pursuing the Grunge look that seems so popular amongst a section of the design community.. Read about it on our [blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020143031/http:/gatf.wordpress.com/) or try it out at [MyFonts.Com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020143031/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/gatf/daub/).
author: Rasendyll
